Important Articles.headline: Paul Singer, the founder and head of Elliott Investment Management, is one of the world's most successful and influential activist investors working today.  Let's take a look at the top five stock holdings of Elliott Management as of the end of 2024 to see what he's bullish on.  Triple Flag Precious Metals (NYSE: TFPM) was the fund's biggest holding at 133.8 million shares, which now has a value of $2.6 billion.
Important Articles.title: Here Are Billionaire Paul Singer's 5 Biggest Stock Holdings

Important Articles.headline: The airline has enjoyed unusual brand loyalty. But under activist pressure to shore up profits, Southwest is gambling with what customers love most.
Important Articles.title: Can Southwest make investors and its most loyal customers happy?

Important Articles.headline: Heathrow Airport, one of the world's busiest, is closed today after a fire at an electrical substation nearby caused a massive power outage. The closure has sparked travel chaos across the globe, with over 1,300 flights already canceled. Following the news, travel and leisure stocks in the US and UK, including Delta (DAL) and British Airways parent International Airlines Group, are under pressure today. Tune in to The Morning Brief beginning at 9am ET with Brad Smith and Myles Udland for the latest developments.
Important Articles.title: Heathrow Airport shuts down after fire, traffic snarled
